description:
Convert your music to any format

MediaHuman Audio Converter is a free application for macOS and Windows. With it you can convert music in formats like MP3, AAC, WMA, OGG, etc. as well as in lossless formats like FLAC, Apple Lossless, AIFF, WAV (up to 32 bit).
- improvements for CUE splitting
- corrected selecting of bits for ALAC and FLAC
- corrected using of 'fade out/in' option together with 'limit duration'
- corrected 'silence trim' option together with normalization
- fixed writing of picture and id3v2 tags to WAV file
- fixed writing of TRACKTOTAL, DISCNUMBER and DISCTOTAL tags
